title: March 2020 Meetup Tour Update #2
description:
Convo with Job and John about the tour. https://youtu.be/SKA2mGRip2c



In March 2020 Job, Jon Van Donk and I will set out on a road trip to host meetups from Tucson AZ to Vancouver BC. Some of the plans in cities are set, others not so much. So leave ideas in the comment section. Here are the dates. 

March 2 and 3 Tucson AZ  http://www.villagersonline.com/
March 4 Los Angeles (TBD)
March 5 Chino CA https://www.meetup.com/Jordan-Peterson-Inland-Empire-Meetup/
March 14 Fresno CA https://www.meetup.com/Fresno-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/267837868/
March 15 Sacramento CA https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/267806924
March 16 Salem OR https://www.sunnyslope.org/
March 17 Seattle WA 
March 18 Vancouver BC
March 19 Portland OR 2800 NW 153 Ave Beaverton, OR 97006
March 21 Alameda CA https://www.meetup.com/Alameda-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/ San Jose too? 
March 22 Sacramento CA Wrap up 11am at Living Stones CRC 1390 Florin Rd.
